courses.description: Study the structure, function, and mapping of genes to understand how they influence traits and diseases.
courses.title: Genetics

courses.description: Explore the molecular structure of DNA, its replication, and how it encodes genetic information.
courses.title: Molecular Biology

courses.description: Learn about the genetic variation in populations and the evolutionary processes that shape them.
courses.title: Population Genetics

courses.description: Investigate how genetic factors contribute to health, disease risk, and personalized medicine.
courses.title: Medical Genetics

courses.description: Understand the mechanisms of heredity and how traits are passed down through generations.
courses.title: Heredity

courses.description: Examine how genomic data is analyzed to uncover patterns and relationships in biological research.
courses.title: Genomics

courses.description: Study the interaction between genes and the environment in shaping biological traits.
courses.title: Epigenetics
